xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon If using MSI Airplane will cause irregular freezing or crashing issues, you can set it in MSI Airplane, add dock_64.exe, then select dock_64.exe, and finally select "None" on the right side. Changelog 1.Fixed the issue that the Launchpad folder could not be deleted when there was only one text when the name was modified 2.Fixed the problem that the QQ music window was displayed abnormally 3.Adjust the stage scheduling mechanism so that the pinned window will not automatically retract the window list when the window is switched 4.Fixed the issue that when CS2 full-screen resolution was used at 4:3 after myfinder was enabled, the actual position of the mouse click and the position displayed by the game were offset and the screen could not be cut to enter the game 5.Fixed the rendering error of dragging and dropping animations in the built-in window (preferences, etc.) in Stage Manager 6.Fixed the misrendering of the text in the preference search box 7.Fixed the issue that if there were too many devices in the MyFinder Bluetooth list, the list would display a blank area 8.Fixed the issue that the text could not be read clearly after switching the color of the icon mask from the dock battery icon 9.Corrected the Italian translation, thanks to netizens for @Kevin 10.Fixed other crashes caused by rendering
